page.description: Loads data that was previously saved to the Repository.

argument.name: key
argument.description: The saved data in the repository to be loaded.

argument.name: flagDelete
argument.description: Logical. True = delete the repository entry after it is read.

description.p: The component is populated with the data that was saved to the Repository. The 'afterLoadFromRepository' client-side event fires after the event has completed.
If the optional flagDelete parameter is true, then the Repository entry is deleted after it has been read.
